des:
Jainism or Jain Dharma is an antiquated religion. Devotees of Jainism are designated as “Jains”, a word got from the Sanskrit word jina (victor) and importance the way of triumph in traverse life’s flood of resurrections through a moral and profound life. Jains follow their history through a progression of twenty-four successful heros and instructors known as tirthankaras, with the first being Ruler Adinath, who is otherwise called Rishabha Dev, who as indicated by Jain custom lived a large number of years back, twenty-third being Parshvanatha in eighth century BC and twenty-fourth being the Mahavira around 500 BCE (around two thousand five hundred years prior). Jains trust that Jainism is an everlasting dharma with the tirthankaras managing each cycle of the Jain cosmology. Jain Dharma trusts that the Ratantraya or the three gems ((Right Faith, Right Knowledge, Right Conduct) can indicate you way of freedom.

DAILY Bhaktamar strota PRAYER ROUTINE :
To add this prayer to a daily timer, 
follow these steps:
 1 - Open your Alexa App.
 2 - Select Routines.
 3 - Select Schedule, add a time (say 7 AM). 
4 - Choose Skills / Your Skills. 
5 - Choose 'Bhaktamar strota'. Done.

You can use the skill as:
Alexa, open bhaktamar prayer

You can also use pause, play, stop and resume features.
